name: The Perfect Cake (Bellseboss Studio)
description:
Well. . . here it is. . . your partner is coming  and you wanna make them happy making a delicious cake. . .  or you might learn a terrible secret (and lose your life). But no worries, YOU ARE NOT ALONE and all the characters in THE PERFECT CAKE will help you complete your quest before you run out of time.  

Explore our scenarios, talk to different characters, and complete short missions in this 3D horror adventure! We hope you have a good time and make The Perfect Cake... or die. 

Controls: 

Movement: AWSD or ↑ (top arrow),↓ (down arrow), → (right arrow),← (left arrow).

Pause: P

Inventory: Tab

Belseboss team:

Joaquín A. Paz Cortez: Game Design

Luis Armando Mendoza Ponce: 3D modeller, textures / environment

Luis Plata: Lead Programmer

Nicolas R. Tedesco: Animation & Cinematic
